Class getBullet

java.lang.Object
getBullet
public class getBullet
extends java.lang.Object

Doodle Tanks (getBullet)

By: Atilla Awista, Kalea Tse, Noor Qureshi
Date: January 27, 2022

This is the main file for the bullet animation in the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    getBullet​(int intTankX, double dblPower, double dblAngle, boolean boolLaunched, boolean boolServerTank)
    Constructs a bullet and draws it to the screen when called.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void drawIt​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Draws the bullet that is being shot and draws it to the screen.
    void nextPos()
    Overrides the method in JPanel.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • getBullet

      public getBullet​(int intTankX, double dblPower, double dblAngle, boolean boolLaunched, boolean boolServerTank)
      Constructs a bullet and draws it to the screen when called. The arc that the bullet is drawn in varies depending on the starting x-coordinate of the tank shooting, the power the gun is set to, and what angle to shoot at.

  • Method Details

    • nextPos

      public void nextPos()
      Overrides the method in JPanel. To draw this APanel differently, JPanel by default draws a grey background. APanel will draw whatever we want it to/ This method is also used to determine the next coordinate where the bullet will be drawn to.

    • drawIt

      public void drawIt​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the bullet that is being shot and draws it to the screen.
